author: Karen Roland
text:
We are looking for some guidelines on how to do the required self-assessment, and the roles and responsibilities of the ADA coordinator.  Please contact me if you have a successful ADA program, or you can just send me copies of documentation regarding your program.  Documentation that could really help us would be:  Procedures for the Self-Assessment, job description of the ADA coordinator, or brochures that describe your program.
Any help and guidance you can provide will be greatly appreciated.
THANKS
